website_summaries.verdict: A solid changing station that provides plenty of table space for baby and gear.
pros: Two storage bins for liners and wipes
Two corner bag hooks keep diaper bags or grocery bags off the floor
Good table space for a changing station this size

customer_reviews.title: Solid well built, slight trouble in the installation.
customer_reviews.text: Solid and well built. The only issue I had was that the provided anchor screws were not long enough to each the stud. I installed it in a business bathroom with tile and metal studs which I imagine is what most people will do. I needed about ~2 centimeters more. A trip to the local Lowes fixed the problem though. Other than that the item is as described.
customer_reviews.author: Benito Huerta

customer_reviews.title: Install is a pain
customer_reviews.text: Product is OK, the anchors than came with it were a bit flimsy, tend to break during install (toggle falls off and slides down inside of wall). Also, be sure to make a template for your holes, they are round holes, not slotted, so there is no room for error, holes must be drilled precisely. Could have been made a bit more user friendly.
customer_reviews.author: Sage Wheeler

customer_reviews.title: The table itself is perfect. The instructions on the other hand are minimal ...
customer_reviews.text: The table itself is perfect. The instructions on the other hand are minimal although in a zillion languages. It would have been helpful to know the mounting height especially to be ADA compliant
customer_reviews.author: RidgeKid

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works great for my day carE. I put it in the day care bathroom.
customer_reviews.author: Tammy Roberts

customer_reviews.title: needed a baby station that was compact and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this model and was surprised at the simple instalation and ease of use. Good product at a decent price.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel E.

customer_reviews.title: Baby changing station
customer_reviews.text: This was installed in a local church's new family/handicap accessible bathroom. It is very sturdy and they were very pleased with it.
customer_reviews.author: shelly

customer_reviews.title: Great value works great
customer_reviews.text: We bought these for our neighborhood Clubhouse and they are holding up great and look nice as well. Great product value.
customer_reviews.author: Courtney

customer_reviews.title: i love it!
customer_reviews.text: I Love it. It's compact and very sturdy with plenty of space for the child. It has compartments that I use for storing gloves and wipes.
customer_reviews.author: maria fernandez

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: We purchased one of these for our church. Installation was easy and it works great.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Davis

customer_reviews.title: Great baby changing table
customer_reviews.text: This folding changing table is very well made and easily installed
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product and fast delivery
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this change table, it's really thin when folded up on the wall and also very strong. A bonus is having a place to store wipes/rubber gloves inside when folded up too. Delivery was fast especially considering we are in Sydney Australia. Thanks guys!!
customer_reviews.author: Darren Zelazne

product_meta.title: Rubbermaid Commercial Horizontal Baby Changing Station, 33.25-Inch Length x 21.5-Inch Width x 4-Inch Height, Light Platinum (FG781888LPLAT)
product_meta.description: Style:HorizontalThe Rubbermaid Commercial Horizontal Baby Changing Station is designed for commercial environments. Built from high-density polypropylene, this baby changing pad table does not absorb moisture. This baby station meets all global EN, FDA, ADA, and ASTM safety standards. The sturdy station features an accessory shelf to keep items away from baby plus easy reach hooks. The smooth surface makes this changing table easy to clean.
feature_bullets: Safety straps and a intended changing surface help keep baby secure
Constructed from study materials for durability and antimicrobial protection
Meets global EN, FDA, ADA, and ASTM safety standards
Built-in accessory shelf and hooks keep items away from the baby
